name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Overpowering_Presence_E
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Overpowering Presence E
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, enhances the hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}%, the hold duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}%, the immobilization duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}%, the sleep duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}%, the fear duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}% and the confuse duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}%, reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Controllers and may be slotted into most control powers and requires the user to be level 50.
power_short_helps: Enhances Accuracy and Control Duration, Increases Attack Rate, and Reduces Endurance Cost
